note.p: Land owner. Of Hamstead Park, Birmingham; later of Ashfurlong House, Sutton Coldfield, Warwickshire. Death announcement gives age as 79; baptism of Roger son of Roger Vaughton at St Martinâ€™s, Birmingham, March 1739.
